CustomField.formula:
Total__c + ( Total__c * Tax__c )
/*((buildertek__Total__c - (buildertek__Total__c * buildertek__Discount__c)) + (buildertek__Total__c - (buildertek__Total__c * buildertek__Discount__c))* buildertek__Tax__c)*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Quote Amount with Tax and Shipping & Handling.
CustomField.label: Total Amount
